thread.title: Higher-storage Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus discounted in Malaysia
thread.title_full: Higher-storage Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus discounted in Malaysia

author: Erna Mahyuni
title: Higher-storage Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus discounted in Malaysia
text:
Higher-storage Apple iPhone 7 and 7 Plus discounted in Malaysia Forget about the 32GB model - you can now go straight for the 128GB and 256GB models 27 February 2017 / 12:20MYT 
In a surprise development, Apple resellers in Malaysia have dropped the price for the iPhone 7 128GB and 256GB models. Limited time promotion 
Machines Malaysia was among the first to announce the RM500 discount on the iPhone 7 and 7 Plus 128GB and 256GB models. While the prices on the official Apple Store have not changed, Machines and Switch first announced the discount on their social media pages. Harvey Norman as well as Senheng are also offering the discounts. 
Senheng's website has declared the discount period will be from 26 February to 25 March. 
The new pricing is as follows: 
128GB iPhone 7 - RM3199 (down from RM3699)256GB iPhone 7 - RM3699 (down from RM4199)128GB iPhone 7 Plus - RM3799 (down from RM4299)256GB iPhone 7 Plus - RM4299 (down from RM4799) 
If you're keen on an iPhone 7, check out our guide to tips and tricks for the iPhone 7 and 7 Plus. And skip getting the 32GB model.
